description: Describes a ball hit by a player's paddle.

ball.description: stats related to how the ball moves as a result of being hit (omitted if we couldn't track the ball after the shot was made)

angle.description: The angle at which the ball was hit.

crossed_net.description: `true` if the ball crosses the net, else `false`.

direction.description: Direction that the ball was hit from and to.

distance.description: The distance the ball traveled (feet) before coming in contact with the net, court, paddle, etc.

end_zone.description: Zone the ball bounced in or was next hit from (whichever happens first)

height_over_net.description: Height the ball was over the net when it crossed.

max_height.description: Max height of the ball in its arc (feet).

speed.description: Speed of the ball in MPH.

ball.title: Ball

is_volley.description: whether this shot was a volley hit out of the air or not; omitted if we don't know

player_id.description: the player who hit the ball
player_id.title: Player ID

start_zone.description: Zone the ball was hit from.

title: Shot
